General.Name: Jiangsu Etern Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Etern Company Limited operates in communication cable industry. It offers optical, data, coaxial, and special cables; optical fibers; wires; and communication devices and equipment, as well as communication data and engineering services, and system integration solutions. The company also provides data business support platform. Jiangsu Etern Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is based in Suzhou, China.

1.Title: CFO, Deputy GM, Accounting Supervisor & Non-Independent Director
